title.value: Basing of necessity to modernize existing brake-testers of motor repair enterprises
Обоснование необходимости модернизации существующих обкаточно-тормозных стендов мотороремонтных предприятий

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Zagorodskikh, I.V., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article examines the issues of re-equipment of repair enterprises of the Republic and their preparation for the repair of engines with the capacity of more than 300 kW with the help of modernization of brake testers of home production. We have presented methods of the choice of the main components of the tester for increasing the braking moment on the shaft of the engine and determination of its value. We have given recommendations about resource saving and testing of engines on modernized tester, and about modernization of outdated testers
